title: DelegationCredential v1
description: A delegation credential that grants an agent permission to act on behalf of a user with specific scopes

iss.description: Issuer DID - the user or platform delegating authority

sub.description: Subject - the Agent ID receiving the delegation

aud.description: Audience - the target service(s) for which this delegation is valid

items.description: Scope in resource:action or resource:action:sub-resource format

scope.description: Scopes being delegated to the agent

jti.description: Unique token identifier for revocation tracking

maxActions.description: Maximum number of actions allowed under this delegation

rateLimit.description: Rate limit for actions under this delegation

ipAllowlist.description: IP addresses or CIDR ranges allowed to use this delegation

constraints.description: Optional constraints on how the delegation can be used
